name: Loading Stories: Treadmill
description:
Have you ever wondered why we have to, from time to time, suffer thru the long loading screens? 

Let me introduce you 'Loading Stories (Part 1): Treadmill'. The frenetic-button-smashing experience that will uncover the mysteries of the loading process.

How long it will take? Can you be better than the others? How many keyboards will be destroyed?

Let's find out!

The game has been developed in GameMaker Studio 2 within 10 days, graphic is powered by Aseprite and all sounds were done on my laptop keyboard.

Please feel free to share any feedback, questions, bugs or anything else.
Thank you for Your time!

                                                   

No keyboards were harmed nor destroyed during the development and testing.

Ko-fi || Patreon
